title: Mobile-Based Interdisciplinary Language Integration Education Design [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of fundamental concepts in other subjects
context.additional_context: Education emphasizing the interconnectedness of language subjects with other disciplines (science/social studies/arts) in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can interpret multilayered meanings of language texts with 80% accuracy through interdisciplinary content analysis
Learners complete project outcomes integrating cross-curricular themes (science/social studies) into language activities at a 90% submission rate
Learners improve interdisciplinary learning effectiveness by 75% or more through three or more peer feedback activities on mobile platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
